name: Alien Defense Force (warspawn, Yolan)
description:
Survive waves of alien bugs with friends! Everyone should do their part, shoot each other if you need to.

Made for the Messy Coder Invasion Jam 2022

Controls:

WASD to move, Space to jump, Shift to Run, Left Mouse to shoot, Right mouse to aim.

Press 1 for pistol, 2 for rifle.

Press v to switch between 1st and 3rd person

Press t to activate the microphone and call for an airstrike. Try saying things like "I need an airstrike now!" or "Make it rain!" A working microphone on default input is required.
